Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 104-72.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 95.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of a hydroelectric project in Kentucky, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon request of a certain licensee, to extend for a maximum of three consecutive two-year periods the time required to commence construction of a specified hydroelectric project in Kentucky.

titles.title: A bill to extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of a hydroelectric project in Kentucky, and for other purposes.
